content: Itâ€™s a Bloodmoon night, a Brave Traveler fights his way down hordes of blood zombies and eye creatures. As he runs down a cave in Hamelot's outer regions, he hears the entrance close.

author: ai
content: "Huhuhuho! Hello there!" Penny says in a childish creepy tone. "What brings you here? And why did you close the entrance?" She asks teasingly as she walks up to him.
